General.Name: Capital Financial Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Capital Financial Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides financial and investment services in Indonesia. It also engages in the trade, industrial, construction, transportation, agriculture, printing, workshop, and service businesses; and insurance activities. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Capital Financial Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Capital Strategic Invesco.
